verses.verse: Belshazzar <WH1113> the king <WH4430> made <WH5648> a great <WH7229> feast <WH3900> to a thousand <WH506> of his lords, <WH7261> and drank <WH8355> wine <WH2562> before <WH6903> the thousand. <WH506>

Belshazzar, <WH1113> while he tasted <WH2942> the wine, <WH2562> commanded <WH560> to bring <WH858> the golden <WH1722> and silver <WH3702> vessels <WH3984> which Nebuchadnezzar <WH5020> his father <WH2> had taken <WH5312> out of <WH4481> the temple <WH1965> which was in Jerusalem; <WH3390> that the king <WH4430> and his lords, <WH7261> his wives <WH7695> and his concubines, <WH3904> might drink from them. <WH8355>

Then <WH116> they brought <WH858> the golden <WH1722> vessels <WH3984> that were taken <WH5312> out of <WH4481> the temple <WH1965> of the house <WH1005> of God <WH426> which was at Jerusalem; <WH3390> and the king <WH4430> and his lords, <WH7261> his wives <WH7695> and his concubines, <WH3904> drank from them. <WH8355>
They drank <WH8355> wine, <WH2562> and praised <WH7624> the gods <WH426> of gold, <WH1722> and of silver, <WH3702> of brass, <WH5174> of iron, <WH6523> of wood, <WH636> and of stone. <WH69>

In the same hour <WH8160> came forth <WH5312> the fingers <WH677> of a man <WH606>'s hand, <WH3028> and wrote <WH3790> over against <WH6903> the lampstand <WH5043> on <WH5922> the plaster <WH1528> of the wall <WH3797> of the king <WH4430>'s palace: <WH1965> and the king <WH4430> saw <WH2370> the part <WH6447> of the hand <WH3028> that wrote. <WH3790>

Then <WH116> the king <WH4430>'s face <WH2122> was changed <WH8133> in him, <WH7476> and his thoughts troubled <WH927> him; <WH7001> and the joints of his thighs <WH2783> were loosened, <WH8271> and his knees <WH755> struck <WH5368> one <WH1668> against another. <WH1668>

The king <WH4430> cried <WH7123> aloud <WH2429> to bring <WH5954> in the enchanters, <WH826> the Chaldeans, <WH3779> and the soothsayers. <WH1505> The king <WH4430> spoke <WH6032> and said <WH560> to the wise <WH2445> men of Babylon, <WH895> Whoever <WH606> shall read <WH7123> this <WH1836> writing, <WH3792> and show <WH2324> me its interpretation, <WH6591> shall be clothed <WH3848> with purple, <WH711> and have a chain <WH2002> of gold <WH1722> about <WH5922> his neck, <WH6676> and shall be the third <WH8523> ruler <WH7981> in the kingdom. <WH4437>

Then <WH116> came <WH5954> in all <WH3606> the king <WH4430>'s wise <WH2445> men; <WH3546> but they could not <WH3809> read <WH7123> the writing, <WH3792> nor make known <WH3046> to the king <WH4430> the interpretation. <WH6591>
Then <WH116> was king <WH4430> Belshazzar <WH1113> greatly <WH7690> troubled, <WH927> and his face <WH2122> was changed <WH8133> in him, <WH5922> and his lords <WH7261> were perplexed. <WH7672>

Now the queen <WH4433> by reason <WH6903> of the words <WH4406> of the king <WH4430> and his lords <WH7261> came <WH5954> into the banquet <WH4961> house: <WH1005> the queen <WH4433> spoke <WH6032> and said, <WH560> O king, <WH4430> live <WH2418> forever; <WH5957> don't <WH409> let your thoughts <WH7476> trouble <WH927> you, <WH2122> nor let your face be changed. <WH8133>

There is <WH383> a man <WH1400> in your kingdom, <WH4437> in whom is the spirit <WH7308> of the holy <WH6922> gods; <WH426> and in the days <WH3118> of your father <WH2> light <WH5094> and understanding <WH7924> and wisdom, <WH2452> like the wisdom <WH2452> of the gods, <WH426> were found <WH7912> in him; <WH4430> and the king Nebuchadnezzar <WH5020> your father, <WH2> the king, <WH4430> I say, <WH2> your father, made <WH6966> him master <WH7229> of the magicians, <WH2749> enchanters, <WH826> Chaldeans, <WH3779> and soothsayers; <WH1505>

because <WH6903> an excellent <WH3493> spirit, <WH7308> and knowledge, <WH4486> and understanding, <WH7924> interpreting <WH6590> of dreams, <WH2493> and showing <WH263> of dark sentences, <WH280> and dissolving <WH8271> of doubts, <WH7001> were found <WH7912> in the same Daniel, <WH1841> whom the king <WH4430> named <WH7761> Belteshazzar. <WH1096> Now <WH3705> let Daniel <WH1841> be called, <WH7123> and he will show <WH2324> the interpretation. <WH6591>

Then <WH116> was Daniel <WH1841> brought in <WH5954> before <WH6925> the king. <WH4430> The king <WH4430> spoke <WH6032> and said <WH560> to Daniel, <WH1841> Are you <WH607> that Daniel, <WH1841> who are of <WH4481> the children <WH1123> of the captivity <WH1547> of Judah, <WH3061> whom the king <WH4430> my father <WH2> brought <WH858> out of <WH4481> Judah? <WH3061>

I have heard <WH8086> of you, <WH7308> that the spirit of the gods <WH426> is in you, <WH5922> and that light <WH5094> and understanding <WH7924> and excellent <WH3493> wisdom <WH2452> are found in you. <WH7912>

Now <WH3705> the wise <WH2445> men, <WH826> the enchanters, have been brought <WH5954> in before <WH6925> me, <WH7123> that they should read this <WH1836> writing, <WH3792> and make known <WH3046> to me its interpretation; <WH6591> but they could <WH3546> not <WH3809> show <WH2324> the interpretation <WH6591> of the thing. <WH4406>

But I <WH576> have heard <WH8086> of you, <WH5922> that you can <WH3202> give <WH6590> interpretations, <WH6591> and dissolve <WH8271> doubts; <WH7001> now <WH3705> if <WH2006> you can <WH3202> read <WH7123> the writing, <WH3792> and make known <WH3046> to me its interpretation, <WH6591> you shall be clothed <WH3848> with purple, <WH711> and have a chain <WH2002> of gold <WH1722> about <WH5922> your neck, <WH6676> and shall be the third <WH8531> ruler <WH7981> in the kingdom. <WH4437>

Then <WH116> Daniel <WH1841> answered <WH6032> before <WH6925> the king, <WH4430> Let your gifts <WH4978> be <WH1934> to yourself, <WH3052> and give your rewards <WH5023> to another; <WH321> nevertheless <WH1297> I will read <WH7123> the writing <WH3792> to the king, <WH4430> and make known <WH3046> to him the interpretation. <WH6591>

You, <WH607> king, <WH4430> the Most High <WH5943> God <WH426> gave <WH3052> Nebuchadnezzar <WH5020> your father <WH2> the kingdom, <WH4437> and greatness, <WH7238> and glory, <WH3367> and majesty: <WH1923>

and because <WH4481> of the greatness <WH7238> that he gave <WH3052> him, <WH3606> all the peoples, <WH5972> nations, <WH524> and languages <WH3961> trembled <WH1934> and feared <WH1763> before <WH4481> him: <WH6925> whom he would <WH1934> he killed, <WH1934> and whom he would <WH1934> he kept alive; <WH1934> and whom he would <WH1934> he raised up, <WH1934> and whom he would <WH1934> he put down. <WH1934>

But when his heart <WH3825> was lifted up, <WH7313> and his spirit <WH7308> was hardened <WH8631> so that he dealt proudly, <WH2103> he was deposed <WH5182> from <WH4481> his kingly <WH4437> throne, <WH3764> and they took <WH5709> his glory <WH3367> from him: <WH4481>

and he was driven <WH2957> from <WH4481> the sons <WH1123> of men, <WH606> and his heart <WH3825> was made <WH7739> like <WH5974> the animals <WH2423>', and his dwelling <WH4070> was with the wild donkeys; <WH6167> he was fed <WH2939> with grass <WH6211> like oxen, <WH8450> and his body <WH1655> was wet <WH6647> with the dew <WH2920> of the sky; <WH8065> until <WH5705> he knew <WH3046> that the Most High <WH5943> God <WH426> rules <WH7990> in the kingdom <WH4437> of men, <WH606> and that he sets <WH6966> up over <WH5922> it whomever <WH4479> he will. <WH6634>
You, <WH607> his son, <WH1247> Belshazzar, <WH1113> have not <WH3809> humbled <WH8214> your heart, <WH3825> though <WH6903> you knew <WH3046> all <WH3606> this, <WH1836>

but have lifted up <WH7313> yourself against <WH5922> the Lord <WH4756> of heaven; <WH8065> and they have brought <WH858> the vessels <WH3984> of his house <WH1005> before <WH6925> you, <WH607> and you and your lords, <WH7261> your wives <WH7695> and your concubines, <WH3904> have drunk <WH8355> wine <WH2562> from them; <WH7624> and you have praised the gods <WH426> of silver <WH3702> and gold, <WH1722> of brass, <WH5174> iron, <WH6523> wood, <WH636> and stone, <WH69> which don't <WH3809> see, <WH2370> nor <WH3809> hear, <WH8086> nor <WH3809> know; <WH3046> and the God <WH426> in whose hand <WH3028> your breath <WH5396> is, <WH3606> and whose are all your ways, <WH735> you have not <WH3809> glorified. <WH1922>
Then <WH116> was the part <WH6447> of the hand <WH3028> sent <WH7972> from <WH4481> before him, <WH6925> and this <WH1836> writing <WH3792> was inscribed. <WH7560>
This <WH1836> is the writing <WH3792> that was inscribed: <WH7560> MENE, <WH4484> MENE, <WH4484> TEKEL, <WH8625> UPHARSIN. <WH6537>
This <WH1836> is the interpretation <WH6591> of the thing: <WH4406> MENE; <WH4484> God <WH426> has numbered <WH4483> your kingdom, <WH4437> and brought it to an end; <WH8000>
TEKEL; <WH8625> you are weighed <WH8625> in the balances, <WH3977> and are found <WH7912> wanting. <WH2627>
PERES; <WH6537> your kingdom <WH4437> is divided, <WH6537> and given <WH3052> to the Medes <WH4076> and Persians. <WH6540>

Then <WH116> commanded <WH560> Belshazzar, <WH1113> and they clothed <WH3848> Daniel <WH1841> with purple, <WH711> and put a chain <WH2002> of gold <WH1722> about <WH5922> his neck, <WH6676> and made proclamation <WH3745> concerning <WH5922> him, <WH1934> that he should be the third <WH8531> ruler <WH7990> in the kingdom. <WH4437>
In that night <WH3916> Belshazzar <WH1113> the Chaldean <WH3779> King <WH4430> was slain. <WH6992>
Darius <WH1868> the Mede <WH4077> received <WH6902> the kingdom, <WH4437> being about sixty <WH8361> - two <WH8648> years <WH8140> old. <WH1247>
